reviewText: Great documentary, rode on those trains as a kid when living in Botswana and going to boarding school in Rhodesia.  Made me homesick!
Did not personally care for it.

For the price, it can't be beat.

I preferred the Blue Train DVD, but this one has more detail on historic background and culture, esp. of Zimbabwe. Dates to around 2002 or so, so not sure whether it still runs.
Fantastic camera shots and narration; it certainly makes you want to take this trip! Wish it showed more animals; we only saw elephants and other common animals.
